content:
TITLE: Creating a New Discord Client in Go
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to construct a new Discord client using DiscordGo. The client can be used to access Discord API functions and set callback functions for Discord events. It requires an authentication token.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
discord, err := discordgo.New("Bot " + "authentication token")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing DiscordGo Package in Go
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to import the DiscordGo package into a Go project, making its functionality available for use.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
import "github.com/bwmarrin/discordgo"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing DiscordGo Package in Go
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the latest tagged release of the DiscordGo package from the master branch using Go's package management system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go get github.com/bwmarrin/discordgo
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing DiscordGo package on Linux/BSD
DESCRIPTION: Commands to download and install the DiscordGo package using Go's package management. First downloads the package to GOPATH/src with go get, then compiles and installs it to enable editor autocomplete.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/docs/GettingStarted.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go get github.com/bwmarrin/discordgo
```

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/bwmarrin/discordgo
go install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the Slash Commands Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the slash commands example code in Go. This assumes a working Go environment and that DiscordGo is correctly installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/slash_commands/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Slash Commands Bot
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the compiled slash commands bot. This requires your Discord bot token and optionally a test guild ID for registering commands to a specific server rather than globally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/slash_commands/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./slash_commands -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the DiscordGo Components Example
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to compile the DiscordGo components example using the go build command from within the components example folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/components/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the DiscordGo Components Example Bot
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to run the compiled components example with required command-line parameters: application ID, test guild ID, and bot token.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/components/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./components -app YOUR_APPLICATION_ID -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building DiscordGo Context Menu Commands Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: This command compiles the context_menus example within its folder. It assumes a working Go environment and correct DiscordGo installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/context_menus/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running DiscordGo Context Menu Commands Example
DESCRIPTION: This command demonstrates how to start the bot from the context_menus example folder. It requires specifying the application ID, testing guild ID, and bot token as command-line arguments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/context_menus/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./context_menus -app YOUR_APPLICATION_ID -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the DiscordGo Autocomplete Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the autocomplete example for DiscordGo. Assumes a working Go environment and DiscordGo installed on the system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/autocomplete/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the DiscordGo Autocomplete Example with Command-line Arguments
DESCRIPTION: Example command to start the Discord bot with guild ID for testing and bot token. The bot registers slash commands with autocomplete functionality in the specified guild.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/autocomplete/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./autocomplete -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building DiscordGo Modals Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: This command compiles the DiscordGo modals example. It assumes a working Go environment and DiscordGo installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/modals/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running DiscordGo Modals Example with Command-line Arguments
DESCRIPTION: This command demonstrates how to run the compiled modals example with necessary arguments including application ID, guild ID, results channel, and bot token.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/modals/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./modals -app YOUR_APPLICATION_ID -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -results YOUR_TESTING_CHANNEL -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the DiscordGo DM Ping Pong Bot in Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the Discord bot example from within the dm_pingpong folder. Requires a working Go environment and properly installed DiscordGo library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/dm_pingpong/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the DiscordGo DM Ping Pong Bot with Bot Token
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Discord bot with authentication token. The bot uses tokens for authentication rather than username/password which is the recommended approach for Discord bots.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/dm_pingpong/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./dm_pingpong -t YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
Bot is now running.  Press CTRL-C to exit.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the DiscordGo Ping Pong example
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the DiscordGo Ping Pong example from source code. Requires a working Go environment and the DiscordGo library to be correctly installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/pingpong/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the DiscordGo Ping Pong bot with a token
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Ping Pong bot with a Discord bot token for authentication. The bot will respond to 'ping' with 'Pong!' and 'pong' with 'Ping!' until terminated with CTRL-C.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/pingpong/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./pingpong -t YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
Bot is now running.  Press CTRL-C to exit.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Viewing help documentation for the DiscordGo Ping Pong bot
DESCRIPTION: Command to display the help information for the Ping Pong bot, showing available command-line options including the token parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/pingpong/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./pingpong --help
Usage of ./pingpong:
  -t string
        Bot Token
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the Threads Example with Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the threads example application. This assumes you have a working Go environment and DiscordGo installed on your system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/threads/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Threads Example with Bot Token
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the threads example application with your Discord bot token. This is required to authenticate the bot with Discord's API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/threads/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./threads -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building DiscordGo Scheduled Events Example
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the scheduled events example program.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/scheduled_events/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running DiscordGo Scheduled Events Bot
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the scheduled events bot with required parameters including guild ID, bot token, and voice channel ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/scheduled_events/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./scheduled_events -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN -voice YOUR_TESTING_CHANNEL
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the DiscordGo Stage Instance Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the stage_instance example application. Requires a working Go environment with DiscordGo correctly installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/stage_instance/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the DiscordGo Stage Instance Example with Command Arguments
DESCRIPTION: Example command for running the stage_instance program with required parameters including guild ID, stage channel ID, and bot token.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/stage_instance/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./stage_instance -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -stage STAGE_CHANNEL_ID -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building DiscordGo Auto Moderation Example
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile the auto moderation example code. Requires a working Go environment and DiscordGo installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/auto_moderation/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running DiscordGo Auto Moderation Bot
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the auto moderation bot with required parameters including channel ID, guild ID, and bot token.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/auto_moderation/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./auto_moderation -channel YOUR_TESTING_CHANNEL -guild YOUR_TESTING_GUILD -token YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building DiscordGo Avatar Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: Compiles the DiscordGo avatar example. Assumes a working Go environment and correctly installed DiscordGo.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/avatar/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Discord Avatar from Local File using DiscordGo
DESCRIPTION: Example command to set a Discord avatar using a local file with the DiscordGo avatar tool. Requires a bot token and the path to the avatar image file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/avatar/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./avatar -t TOKEN -f avatar.png
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Discord Avatar from URL using DiscordGo
DESCRIPTION: Example command to set a Discord avatar using a URL with the DiscordGo avatar tool. Requires a bot token and the URL of the avatar image.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/avatar/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./avatar -t TOKEN -u https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bwmarrin/discordgo/master/docs/img/discordgo.svg
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Usage Help for DiscordGo Avatar Example
DESCRIPTION: Displays the command-line usage help for the DiscordGo avatar example, showing available options for bot token, avatar file, and image URL.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/avatar/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./avatar --help
Usage of ./avatar:
  -f string
        Avatar File Name
  -t string
        Bot Token
  -u string
        URL to the avatar image
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Discord Voice Receiver
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the voice receiver application using Go modules
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/voice_receive/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Discord Voice Receiver
DESCRIPTION: Command line usage showing how to run the voice receiver with required parameters: bot token, guild ID, and channel ID
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/voice_receive/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./voice_receive -t MY_TOKEN -g 1234123412341234 -c 5678567856785678
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compiling DiscordGo Airhorn Example in Go
DESCRIPTION: This command compiles the Airhorn example bot. It assumes a working Go environment and DiscordGo installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/airhorn/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running DiscordGo Airhorn Bot with Token
DESCRIPTION: This command demonstrates how to start the Airhorn bot using a bot token. Replace YOUR_BOT_TOKEN with the actual token.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/airhorn/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./airhorn -t YOUR_BOT_TOKEN
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating DCA Sound File for DiscordGo Airhorn Bot
DESCRIPTION: This command converts an MP3 file to the DCA format used by the Airhorn bot. It requires FFmpeg and the DCA CLI to be installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/katara-ai-inc/discordgo/blob/master/examples/airhorn/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
ffmpeg -i test.mp3 -f s16le -ar 48000 -ac 2 pipe:1 | dca > test.dca
```
